document_data.name: Kume Sa Yeti
document_data.mainbody: The '''Kume Sa Yeti''' was a great hunt by packs of [[yeti]] on the realm of [[Tabot]] in {{YearlinkConvert|2339|SY}}.
document_data.History:
That year, yeti descended from the [[Wu Pi Te Shao Mountains|Wu Pi Te Shar Mountains]] and fell upon [[Frekang Gompa]], and they killed or kidnapped 280 lamas out of the total of 400 at the monastery.

Centuries later, in {{YearlinkConvert|2607|SY}}, some Tabotans feared the coming of another Kume Sa Yeti, when the snow men emerged from Wu Pi Te Shar once again to raid [[Nafeen Gompa]], killing 23 and causing great damage. The authorities in [[Thok]] organized a hunting expedition against them.<ref>
